readme:
# Execute as Perl

![Screenshot](https://raw.github.com/ashleywillis/execute-as-perl/master/screenshot.png)

This is a port of [execute-as-ruby](https://atom.io/packages/execute-as-ruby).

It either runs the current line or the current selection with Perl.

This allows for quick math inside Atom, easily testing that block of code, etc.
